1288630.name: City Defender
1288630.description:
This is an intense combat game inspired by the classics of the 80s, mixing defense of towers and ships with 2D arcade. Defend the cities of a primitive planet from attacks by space pirates using a mobile artillery cannon.

29 cities with beautiful scenery
A lot of rounds with exciting music
5 difficulty levels
Fun casual mode
Really challenging hard mode
Very simplified controls
Supports using mouse or touch
Over 7 hours of gameplay in the most difficult mode
Powerups available during battle to improve your weapon
Different types of enemy artillery with different behaviors
1288630.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
